verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H5012"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w*. \w Tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w imagination|strong="H3820"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H5030"\w* \w follow|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* own \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w yet|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1115"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w* \w among|strong="H7776"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w ruins|strong="H2723"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gaps|strong="H6556"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w restore|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H1447"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w visions|strong="H7723"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w* \w lying|strong="H3577"\w* \w divinations|strong="H7081"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* claim, ‘\w Thus|strong="H1697"\w* \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,’ \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*; \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w fulfillment|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w*.

Haven’t \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w vision|strong="H4236"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lying|strong="H3577"\w* \w divination|strong="H4738"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* proclaim, ‘\w Thus|strong="H3808"\w* \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,’ \w even|strong="H3808"\w* though \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w you|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3282"\w* \w uttered|strong="H1696"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* words \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w visions|strong="H7723"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3651"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3045"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w see|strong="H2374"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w visions|strong="H7723"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* speak \w lying|strong="H3577"\w* \w divinations|strong="H7080"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w council|strong="H5475"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w register|strong="H3791"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* enter \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w they|strong="H3282"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* led \w My|strong="H1129"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* astray, saying, ‘\w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*,’ \w when|strong="H2009"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* whitewashing any flimsy \w wall|strong="H2434"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w*,

tell \w those|strong="H1961"\w* whitewashing \w the|strong="H1961"\w* wall \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*. \w Rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5307"\w* torrents, \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* send hailstones plunging \w down|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* windstorm \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w burst|strong="H1234"\w* \w forth|strong="H1234"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H2009"\w* \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* asked, ‘\w Where|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* whitewash \w with|strong="H2902"\w* \w which|strong="H7023"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w covered|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*?’

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w In|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* release \w a|strong="H3068"\w* windstorm, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w* torrents \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w and|strong="H7307"\w* hail \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* destructive \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tear|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* whitewashed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* level \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w its|strong="H3045"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w exposed|strong="H1540"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H7023"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3615"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2534"\w* after I have vented \w My|strong="H3615"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w against|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w and|strong="H2534"\w* \w against|strong="H2534"\w* those who whitewashed \w it|strong="H3615"\w*, I \w will|strong="H2534"\w* say \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w you|strong="H3615"\w*: ‘\w The|strong="H3615"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w is|strong="H2534"\w* \w gone|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H2534"\w* so \w are|strong="H2902"\w* those who whitewashed \w it|strong="H3615"\w*—

those \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H5030"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* saw \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w of|strong="H5030"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w her|strong="H3389"\w* \w when|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H7965"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H5030"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.’

\w Now|strong="H7760"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w imagination|strong="H3820"\w*. \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*

\w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* women \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sew|strong="H8609"\w* magic charms \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrists|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w veils|strong="H4555"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* ensnare \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*. \w Will|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* ensnare \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w preserve|strong="H2421"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w*?

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* \w Me|strong="H5315"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w handfuls|strong="H8168"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* scraps \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*. \w By|strong="H4191"\w* \w lying|strong="H3577"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w should|strong="H3899"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w spared|strong="H2421"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w should|strong="H3899"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w lived|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w See|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* magic charms \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* ensnare \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w birds|strong="H6524"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*. \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w free|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H2220"\w* ensnared \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w birds|strong="H6524"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w off|strong="H5337"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w veils|strong="H4555"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w prey|strong="H4686"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w disheartened|strong="H3512"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w even|strong="H3512"\w* \w though|strong="H3512"\w* \w I|strong="H3282"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* caused \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w grief|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w because|strong="H3282"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w encouraged|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w save|strong="H2421"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w lives|strong="H2421"\w*,

\w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w visions|strong="H7723"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w practice|strong="H7080"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”
